intervalToDescription(uint32).details: Will revert with InvalidInterval if the function receives a unsupported interval

params._hub: The address of the DCA Hub

InvalidInterval().notice: Thrown when a user tries get the description of an unsupported interval

intervalToDescription(uint32).notice: Returns a text description for the given swap interval. For example for 3600, returns 'Hourly'

tokenURI(address,uint256).notice: Generates a token's description, both the JSON and the image inside

userdoc.notice: Produces a string containing the data URI for a JSON metadata string
